body: 10/10 Story | 10/10 Art | 10/10 Character | 10/10 Enjoyment | 10/10 Overall | This is good because i like uniform. Like really really like it. And they draw the uniform so beautifully. So Uniform + Rape, favourite.

I think it's that much of a rape. Her resist was kinda dull, like when your girlfriend feeds you your favorite food but you are still mad at the argument earlier, you call the food shit and you say you don't wanna eat it but still eat it anyway.
This is not yuri, therefore someone should be on a guillotine for this.
My fear has finally come to reality I see, I hate whoever made this doujin of Hikari getting raped instead of getting a vanilla yuri...
